  <title></title>
  <abstract>This is one of the SB Blueprint's synthesis products using the Environmental Evaluation Modeling System (EEMS).  &lt;div>&#xd;
Upon opening the map, click on the EEMS Explorer icon in the layers tab. (See also &lt;a href="http://drecp.databasin.org/videos" target="_self">the 4 minute EEMS Explorer introductory video&lt;/a>.)&lt;/div>&lt;div>&#xd;
&#xd;
All of the input layers are shown in the EEMS Explorer window, as well as how they are overlaid.  A list of the layers is also in the &amp;quot;Data layers&amp;quot; tab of this synthesis data layer's home page, and the logic model diagram is available online.&#xd;
&#xd;
For an overview, webinar, and peer reviewed publication about EEMS, please see the &lt;a href="https://consbio.org/products/tools/environmental-evaluation-modeling-system-eems" target="_self">EEMS home page&lt;/a>. (Note that our EEMS models do not use &amp;quot;fuzzy logic&amp;quot;.)  See also the &lt;a href="http://sbcblueprint.net/" target="_self">SB Blueprint webpage&lt;/a> for a project overview.&#xd;
&#xd;
&lt;/div>&lt;div>Build 7&lt;/div>&#xd;
&#xd;
This dataset was uploaded to Data Basin and is available with additional information at: /datasets/000bf625b88547caa02890c0958d082c</abstract>
